meanings.sent1: The small house had a red door.
meanings.sent2: My family and I live in a cozy house.
meanings.sent3: The house seemed to be smiling with its bright windows.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the house stood like a quiet giant.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: A family living together in one building.
meanings.sent1: The Smith family is a happy house.
meanings.sent2: Our house always gathers for dinner together.
meanings.sent3: The house of laughter echoed through the halls.
meanings.sent4: Their house was a symphony of voices and footsteps.
meanings.sent5: The house was filled with love and warmth.

meanings.definition: To provide with a place to live or stay.
meanings.sent1: We will house the guests in the spare room.
meanings.sent2: The hotel will house us during our vacation.
meanings.sent3: I can house your plants while you're away.
meanings.sent4: The garage can house all our camping gear.
meanings.sent5: The barn will house the animals for the night.
